name: DebuggerPauseReason
type: enum
summary: |
  Reason that the DataModel was paused.
description: |
  Reason that the DataModel was paused.
codesamples: []
tags: []
deprecationmessage: ''
items:
  - name: Unknown
    summary: |
      Pausing for a reason not covered by other values.
    value: 0
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Requested
    summary: |
      Pause was requested by user.
    value: 1
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Breakpoint
    summary: |
      Pausing on a user breakpoint.
    value: 2
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Exception
    summary: |
      Pausing on error hit in the code.
    value: 3
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: SingleStep
    summary: |
      Pausing on an internal breakpoint set by debugger command: e.g. step over,
      step into, step out of.
    value: 4
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Entrypoint
    summary: |
      Pausing at the entry on the script.
    value: 5
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
